description: FELL 1 x  Magnolia (rear) and 1 x Crab Apple (front)withdrawn by applicant 22/12/23 in e-mail to   below. AGM 22/12/23 From: Nick Hayden <Nick@TreeSurveys.co.uk> Sent: Friday, December 22, 2023 11:50 AMTo: Fuller, Stephen : RBKC <StephenJ.Fuller@rbkc.gov.uk>Subject: Re: Section.211 Notification Ref: ARB/23/07695. 44 Victoria Road, W8.You don't often get email from nick@treesurveys.co.uk. Learn why this is importantHi Stephen,Thank you for taking the time to√ødiscuss the notification this morning, it was much appreciated.Having discussed the matter further with my client, I'd be grateful if you could withdraw the section 211 notification to remove the Magnolia at 44 Victoria Road.Wishing you and the team a Merry Christmas and all the best for 2024.Kind regardsNick
